news.news_body:
Hi all! As the semester starts we have planned information sessions for new and returning students interested in joining the team. Please look below for our scheduled sessions. We look forward to seeing you there!

Saturday, August 27, 2016 // Phillips 203 // 12:30PM
Wednesday, August 31, 2016 // Phillips 219 // 6:30PM
Friday, September 2, 2016 // Phillips 219 // 5:00PM
